mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ONEBOARD ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ONEBOARD (BOARD_NO, NO, TITLE, CONTEXT, REGDATE, FILE_0, REP, GID, SEQ, LEV) values (#{board_no},#{no}, #{title}, #{context}, SYSDATE, #{file_0}, #{rep}, #{board_no},0,0)
mapper.update: UPDATE ONEBOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTEXT = #{context} WHERE BOARD_NO = #{board_no}
